modName: More Interesting Loot Weapon Armor Fixes Remade Patch
summary: Weapon & Armor Fixes Remade (True Weapon Complete version) patch for the loot mod More Interesting loot by GenghisBob.
descriptionHtml:
This is a compatibility patch for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48869/?]More Interesting loot[/url] (version 5.2 used) with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapon & Armor Fixes Remade[/url] (True Weapon Complete option), latest version.

You can use the mod "as is" by checking it in your load mods manager, or merge it with any third party mod.

Requirements:
=============

Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8
More Interesting Loot for Skyrim v5.2+
(not needed but supposed used): Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade v5-0 COMPLETE PLUS


Details:
=======

This mod introduce a lot of fixes from WAFR 5.0 to [b]GenghisBob More Interesting loot mod, including:

[/b]- Armor Rating/Weight
- Weapons Damage/Weight, Speed, Critical damage
- Equip/Unequip Sound, Detection Sound, Equipment Type for some weapons

Notes.

- Items values were never touched
- Unique, Artifact items were never touched
- There were few weapons that were very close to vanilla weapons (by stats and textures/meshes choice), these cases were thoroughly treated according to WAFR line (in any case changes were minimal to comply with the original mod spirit).


Installation
==========

Check the ESP in your mod manager and load after "More Interesting Loot for Skyrim.esp"
or uncheck and merge the mod in bashed patch or any other merged patch.


Change Log
==========

Version 1.0.2

Made sure it's compatible with the latest version 5.2 of "More Interesting Loot Mod":
Updated compatibility for 24 Shields of Elemental Resistance (Dwarven, Ebony, Glass, Hide, Imperial Light, Nordic, Orcish, Stalhrim)
Updated "Detection Sound Level" to "Loud" for 3 Dwarven Battleaxes.


Version 1.0.1

Added "Attack Fail Sound" to all Elven Bows that was forgotten in the last version
Fixed Orsich and Nordic Supple Bows damages
Mod organized on a BAIN friendly archive with a Readme and containing two options
00 Balanced Version (Recommended) 
   this version balance all Supple bows to have only +1 damage (no more nor less, no critical damages changes)
01 Conform Version
   this version follows original mod line where Supple bows have +1, +2 or +3 damage (plus +1 critical damage for some)
   over the original stat bows.


Version 1.0a

Minor fix: reordering plugin masters


Version 1.0

Initial version


Tools used:
==========

TES5Edit 3.0.33
